npc.generic.2.talk.1: Did you know that upgrading a weapon with scrap metal + makes it do 1 damage?
npc.generic.2.talk.2: Those villagers seem strange. Why do they have no hands?
npc.generic.2.follow.no: Sorry but I'm have something to take care of.
npc.generic.2.dating.yes: I... didn't think that day would come but yes!
npc.generic.2.dating.no: Sorry but i don't feel that way
npc.generic.2.divorce.not: Huh? Why are you giving me that?
